text: Father Sergius () is a 1918 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.Объект немого восхищенияПремьера в киноклубе "РГ": Наши в эмиграции It stars Ivan Mosjoukine, Olga Kondorova, and V. Dzheneyeva. ==Actors== *Ivan Mosjoukine as Prince Kasatsky, later Father Sergius *Olga Kondorova as Countess Korotkova *V. Dzheneyeva as Maria - her daughter *Vladimir Gajdarov as Tsar Nicholas I *Nikolai Panov as Kasatsky's father == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1918 drama movies Category:Movies about royalty Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in Saint Petersburg Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: Father Sergius (1918 movie)
